Docs.summary: Defines methods that are used to control the conversion of messages into objects and objects into messages for client applications.

remarks.format:
## Remarks Implement the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.IClientMessageFormatter> interface to create a custom client formatter that serializes objects into messages and deserializes messages into objects for a particular operation.
Attach custom [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/includes/indigo1-md.md)] client formatters to the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.ClientOperation.Formatter%2A> property to handle this conversion explicitly.
